dict.acceptation: 照料，照顾；护理；照管，管理；
倾向（于），趋向（于）；伺侯，招待；关心；注意；

sent.orig: I tend to sulk when I am annoyed and I tend to be a bit oversensitive.
sent.trans: 当我生气的时候会含怒不语，也会过分敏感。

sent.orig: In other words, heavy babies tend grow up fat and long babies tend grow up tall.
sent.trans: 换句话说，重宝宝将来多半会肥胖，长宝宝将来多半会高挑。

sent.orig: Roots tend to grow towards water in a soil, they show positive hydrotropism.
sent.trans: 根的生长倾向于有水的土壤，表现出正向水性。

sent.orig: Heterochromatic areas tend to stain intensely during interphase, sometimes forming condensed masses called chromocentres.
sent.trans: 异染色质部分在间期有染色很浓的倾向，有时形成浓缩的块状，这些块状叫做染色中心。

sent.orig: High-speed electronic communications media, such as electronic mail and television, tend to prevent meaningfulthoughtful communication. "151."
sent.trans: 高速的电子通讯媒介，如电子邮件和电视，阻止了人们有思想、有意义的交流。
